divs: Sighting Detailsi awoken about 1:00 am last night and i saw a figure of a person that looked like stanton friedman the ufo resercher and i asked him stanton where did the cia get all of that nuclear tecknology. and the figure disapered and i heared a voice say in the darkness i cant use you in a really discused manner and it walked away into the darkness. and i kept wakeing up and falling back to sleep because what ever it was it had disterbed my sleep patern. as far as the question i had asked not too shure why i asked that question seemed like it just came out. i dont know what to think of that one but who ever it was i hope to GOD it does not come back at all. it may have been a nephilium i see those sometimes.
